title: Jason Ludden
aboutMeIntro: I guess you saw my job application right? Let me tell you a bit about myself....
aboutMeMain: I've been in love with computers since a young age. After studying computer science in university, I have been working professionally doing development in C#, Java, and JavaScript. Although most of my professional work is closed-source, I enjoy coding so much that I've created some totally free, open-source side projects you can check out!
